about_the_game:
It is a 2D pixel role-playing game, players will play a hero, gather friends in the adventure journey to defeat the Demon King.

This game has a simple storyline, there would be a bit challenging, but easy upgrading without repetitive combat. Game content includes classic RPG elements such as turn-based gameplay, random enemies, side quests, etc. In addition, role costumes, fishing and mining also have been added.

During 8-10 hours game process, players could visit 7 towns, experience over 10 battle maps, and defeat over 90 types of monsters. The overall play is relaxed and casual.

The game is independently completed by one person, edited and produced by RPGMAKER MZ, and some game setting have referred to the series of Dragon Quest. Main characters created by myself, other content, including tilesets, music, and plugins used free and paid resources.
